name: Air Funnel
description: Technique to create a cannon for small projectiles.

name: Air Scooter
description: A form of transportation invented by Aang.

name: Airbender Staff
description: A wooden stave used primarily by airbenders to augment their bending.

name: Airbender Upgraded Staff
description: Upgraded staff made by Mechanist for Aang at the Fire Nation Invasion.

name: Asphyxiation
description: Manipulates the flow of air within a person's respiratory system and prevents any new intake of breath by forming a ball of air around the head.

name: Glider
description: Aerial transportation made by Mechanist, inspired from Air nomad gliders.

name: Hot Air Balloon
description: Air balloon created by Mechanist, originally developed for the Fire Nation

name: Crystal Armor
description: Armor made of crystal that makes the person cannot move.

name: Earth Sink
description: Make the person sink to the ground.

name: Lavabending
description: Manipulate molten earth.

name: Metalbending
description: Ability to bend metal.

name: Rock Gloves
description: Favored weapons of Ba Sing Se's secret police force, known as the Dai Li.

name: Slinky Tank
description: Stone vehicles provided both transportation and protection during the invasion of the Fire Nation.

name: Surface Rocks
description: Largse rocks used as projectiles of Royal Earthbender Guards.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames, which are hotter than the orange flames.

name: Combustionbending
description: Ignite objects with their mind instead of traditional firebending methods.

name: Fire Armor
description: Fire Nation armor.

name: Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating the yin and yang energies.

name: Shozin Comet
description: Formerly known as the Great Comet. A celestial object that passes close to the Earth every one hundred years, just skimming the surface of the upper atmosphere.

name: Trebuchets
description: Large weapons to conduct long-range artilery warfare.

name: Wall of Flames
description: Wall of concentrated flames acts as a barrier to incoming attacks.

name: Bloodbending
description: Ability that allows waterbender to manipulate person's movement.

name: Club
description: A blunt force weapon used for striking. Mostly used by Sokka.

name: Full Moon
description: Enhance the ability of water bending.

name: Ice Claws
description: Drawing water around the fingers and freezing it.

name: Ice Prison
description: This technique covers an opponent in a prison made of ice.

name: Tangle Mine
description: Military weapons invented by Hakoda to aid the Southern Water Tribe's quest to defeat the Fire Nation.

name: Wolf Armor
description: Protective battle gear worn by the warriors of the Southern Water Tribe.
